channel.title: CVE Feed for Evergreen Content Poster -- Evergreen Content Poster

item.title: CVE-2024-32824|2024-08-02T02:20:35.591Z -- evergreen%20content%20poster -- evergreen%20content%20poster
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Evergreen Content Poster.This issue affects Evergreen Content Poster: from n/a through 1.4.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-29099|2024-06-04T17:57:29.631Z -- evergreen%20content%20poster -- evergreen%20content%20poster
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Evergreen Content Poster allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Evergreen Content Poster: from n/a through 1.4.1.
